website_summaries.verdict: A solid wood watch box that stands out from the rest.
pros: This solid wood box is well-constructed and looks great
The wood finish feels nice, making this a classy choice for a watch box
The lid is kept in place by small magnets
Holds six watches and has four wood type options
cons: The lid does not stay open on its own

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly high quality
customer_reviews.text: The packaging, the materials, everything is well assembled and presented. I was very happy that it was treated as delicate instrument. The packaging was unbelievably well organized considering the piece came in tight small box and then that was put in another bigger box with lots of bubble wrap. I believe this has been one of the best purchases I've done so far in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the price,fit and finish is good. The pillows seams are well constructed. One caveat, watches with over a 45 mm cases will not fit in the slot. My Seiko SRP797K1 fits very snugly, see photos.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Pulley

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to present my husband with his watch coffin, er, watch box. :) I've always thought these things were weird, and I hate the ones that look like jewelry boxes. This was simple yet elegant and did not look like a jewelry box. Win. While the craftsmanship is hard to tell in pictures, the tangible product was definitely up to my expectations. I invest in serious watches for this modern fashion loving man of mine, and I know he is going to love preserving them for future wear in this stylish box. And? It meets the anniversary requirement for 5 years! (Wood, if you are wondering. The modern alternative was silverware...you read that correctly. Modern=silverware. Not.)
customer_reviews.author: Elena Hill

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I went with this one
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical because this product was very affordable compared to the other high quality ones that I was eyeing. However, I'm so happy I went with this one! The quality of the wood is very nice, and the product is true to the pictures posted. Most importantly, the watch box stays open on its own, the watch cushions are a good quality and it is great to look at. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but the lid does not stay open
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but the lid does not stay open. Needs the hinge and the fabric inside to be a little longer for the lid to stay open. Tired of it slamming closed as I select a watch. Finish is very good, a little lighter in person than the pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: G. F.

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE DISPLAY BOX
customer_reviews.text: If you have 6 watches to showcase....this is an excellent display case. It holds my humble collection in a velvet lined wood display with a glass top. I really like that they applied felt at the bottom so it doesn't scratch my night table. The box was packaged excellently and shipping was fast with Amazon Prime. I'm not sure what else to really say.....the box looks well made, its real wood, I chose the light color and I like to contrast to the cherry wood thats found in my Master bedroom. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GILDO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loved it! It’s a simple design and a great way to display his watches. My husband doesn’t have a ton of watches to store so this was perfect. It’s great quality and affordable. It also comes with warranty. The glass broke while I was moving and I lost the code that was needed for warranty. I reached out to Case Elegance customer service. They are responsive and they understood my situation and were able to send me a new watch box organizer right away. I am very pleased with their service. And I definitely will order another box when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with fantastic costumer support.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looks great and is at a reasonable price. When I received the product, it had some damages to the edges due to handling by Amazon. After letting the producing company know through their feedback process I received a new product immediately. This time the product was in excellent condition. Overall I am very happy with the product, and their costumer support is nothing less than excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product! High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is so high quality! Because of the price I was nervous that it would show up and look cheap. It looks exactly like it does in the picture! This fits even large watches. The glass on the top is so clear it makes the watches look even nicer! The top does stay open as long as you open it slowly. Overall this product is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kate The Kritic

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice looking watch box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking watch box. It arrived on time, and the care in packing was evident upon opening. One of my main reasons for choosing this box was the glass panel on top is larger than on similar boxes. I did take a star off my rating due to the fact that, as mentioned by other reviewers, two of the foam cushions that hold the watches inside the box are quite a tight fit into the provided slots. Other than that, a really nice way to store your watches, especially if you have solar or eco-drive.
customer_reviews.author: Scotshiker

customer_reviews.title: In terms of first impressions based on looks and feel the finish is very nice and it's very solid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift so I haven't used it myself. In terms of first impressions based on looks and feel the finish is very nice and it's very solid. The closure is very precise. I think the recipient will be very pleased with this. I'll post an update if this initial review changes.
customer_reviews.author: ventana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value For The Dollars Spent
customer_reviews.text: OK; here’s the deal. I don’t know about you, but I actually read product descriptions and customer reviews before I buy a product and from that research get an idea in mind of what to expect. Sometimes I can have a sense of anticipation with the process of on-line shopping and that was most definitely present with my purchase of the watch box. My expectations were by far exceeded once I had the watch box in hand. The product is well crafted, aesthetically pleasing, and functional. In brief, you can’t go wrong with a purchase of this product. It’s worth every penny invested. I hope this review is helpful to you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading the Amazon reviews and happy to say I was not disappointed. I got the espresso shade of wood and I couldn't believe the quality. I purchased as a gift for a watch enthusiast so I think he will be very pleased with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ahjumma

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, High-Quality
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! Purchased as an anniversary gift and he loved it. Great price for a quality item. Easy/ smooth open and close adding to the quality. No scratches or defects with the item upon arrival. I did a lot of price comparing on Amazon and Etsy, as well as, looking at monogrammed watch boxes, but this one seemed to be the best price I could find for the dark wood. I like the clean, sleek look of it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Redjo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: My nicer watches all have pretty nice boxes they came in, but this allows me to enjoy them a little more because of the window... I put the manufacturer watch boxes away and loaded the watches into this. I can look at them all every time I grab a watch. That watch I wear once a year can be enjoyed every day now. The box seems very high quality... I like the light magnetic grab as I close it. My biggest watch is about 50mm wide, and that just fits. I'd say maximum width is 50mm in the sections.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying this brand again
customer_reviews.text: I love this box. It's beautiful, well made, sturdy, affordable and displays well! If u could change one thing it would be to add or offer some kind of stand that would lift the back of the box up so it could be tilted for display or have a better angle at the sun to charge watches.....something hidden and something that wont mess with the craftsmanship of the piece. I'll definitely be buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and great customer service at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Case Elegance six watch case with my initial and last name etched in the lower right hand corner of the glass. Overall, I am very impressed and delighted with this classy and elegant case. It is a beautiful product, obviously well-made with a quality look and feel to it, and on top of that it is very reasonably priced. I am also impressed with their partnership with trees.org. Way to go! Thank you, Case Elegance for faster than expected delivery and excellent packaging of a beautiful product at a great price. I will be ordering another one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: RickPawl

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best purchase I’ve ever made on Amazon. The box quality is excellent- the wood is smooth and aligns perfectly, it opens and closes gently and the magnetic closure is a nice touch, and the glass seems like a good, thick quality. I just bought this for my husband for Christmas and can’t wait to give it to him. I was also very impressed that I bought it on Black Friday and it was engraved and delivered to me by the next Tuesday. If that’s not all special enough, our last name has a Č in it and they were able to engrave it! It looks perfect. I’m so happy, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome  Case
customer_reviews.text: This solid wood case has a nice feel to it and is a handsome and organized was to store and display my husband' swatches. There are serveral slots for a collection of watches and this case adds a decretive touch to our dresser. Looks nice, helps organize expensive watches ( & makes cheap watches look expensive at least when they're in the case), and is made with good quality in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Moore

customer_reviews.title: !!!Stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s stunning!!! All around stunning! Got here fast and I did go for the engraved one. It came out flawless and was packaged so well! It was a gift for my husband, he never wanted a watch box organizer because it was “doing too much” but he is in love with it. His watches are big and don’t fit right into the spaces provided so they’re a bit squished in there yet still look very very good! Have already recommended it to friends. Perfect Father’s Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to hold all my watches. When I got it the first time I closed the lid the glass cracked. I was very unhappy but when I wrote a review about it the seller contacted me and sent me a new one. I figured the seller wouldn’t do anything about it but I was very wrong. Very satisfied with the customer service. One bad thing though, if you have watches like mine, 50-55mm you won’t be able to close the lid. They just don’t fit bit that’s not the sellers fault. They do advertise the size of the case. The case is very nice and love the engraving.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, can you PLEASE do SOMETHING about fake reviews?
customer_reviews.text: Trash. The lid doesn't stay open. It's flimsy. Obviously fake reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Doran

customer_reviews.title: This is the best watch box for the price you can get. Period.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic watch box. The finish is superb and for the price you'll have to pat yourself on the back for the purchase. The window is real glass and the whole fit and finish is impeccable. This will handle rather large watches (Diesel sized stupid) , but your average 45mm 48mm will have room. The magnetic lid really works well and keeps lid shut securely without being hard to open. I'll probably buy another sooner than later, as all the slots are filled with my favorite watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety at its Best
customer_reviews.text: I have some very expensive watches that just lay in a drawer. This 6 compartment watch box is just what I needed to secure my watch collection in a very impressive display box. Now my watches are all in one place and safe from being scratched just lying around. Very nice product; inexpensive; and would make a very nice gift, if you are willing to give it up.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Lurquin

customer_reviews.title: When I received it I was really satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I was really satisfied with it. Because it was packaged very well. But when I saw product's color It was really disappointed. It's color in the picture, the inside cushion's color is nearly white and wood's color is almost light brown. However its reall view is not. Cushion's color is ivory which is high purple's ratio and wood color is very dark brown. I really like this goods and packaging style but I really don't like its color.
customer_reviews.author: One_so

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a watch box -- don't buy anything else!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Not only am I impressed by the packaging.. It was treated with such care and wrapped so well-- the product is gorgeous. I can't wait to give this to my fiancé! I looked around for watch boxes and nothing was this quality for this price! Just in awe of the care to detail and the business practice of planting trees. In a world where it's easy to be a cheap seller, thanks for stepping it up 1000% and selling a product that is beautiful and gift worthy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sharp color
customer_reviews.text: The espresso color is very sharp! I love the clear glass top so I can see my watches on display. I’m hoping it becomes a keepsake for my son or even generations. The only problem, at least for my wife, is that it makes our cheap dresser it sits on look like crap!
customer_reviews.author: pdizzleforizzle

customer_reviews.title: Made from plastic and has strong magnets. Not good for mechanical movements...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but has a fundamental flaw. Strong magnets on the lid and the body. Keep your automatic and manual watches away. Had to give this away so I dont inadvertently end up magnetizing my watches. This is absolute trash. Made from plastic and all glued in. Fake reviews. Do not buy. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: tachyonburst

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC, PLASTIC, PLASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement! This box is clearly not made out of solid or any type of wood, it's pure plastic! Also, the top is NOT glass, it's cheap plastic and I'm very disappointed. This box will be returned and now I have no time to buy a real one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the box. As i have getting better watches, they are just laying on the desk. I figured for the price it would be a cheap, low quality box. I was very wrong. It is built well, looks nice and most important, protects my better watches. The only thing, I wish there would have been one like this for more than six, but I'll probably buy a second one in time.
customer_reviews.author: angus

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch collector and have search significantly for the right boxes. I bought a Case Elegance on a whim...never know if the product matches the picture. Well between the expert craftsmanship (I mean these are perfect boxes!), the cost (har to believe they aren't more) and the customer service (terrific people) I now have 20 of them. For many of my Eco watches that are solar powered, they work great...but the craftwork is so good even my higher end ones are there. I truly found a product, cost, service that I'll continue to go back to.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice new home for my watches!
customer_reviews.text: This is a REALLY nice box! It appears to be, in fact, solid wood...not MDF with a veneer. I was pleased when it arrived, not only for the color but also the (apparent) workmanship. The only MINOR nit-pick was that three of the partitions weren't seated properly so I had to push them down into the box a little.
customer_reviews.author: AGB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This watch case is a beautiful color, and has been very sturdy over the past year we've had it. No issues whatsoever. *Note that the pads inside are designed to hold mens' watches. While you can most definitely use it to keep women's timepieces (and we do), you can't clasp the watch before placing it inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Great GREAT VALUE FOR YOUR $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys !! I have to say ... this box is wonderful. Even though we should expect what we buy to come the way it looks in the picture, it all too often does NOT.. HOWEVER it came looking exactly like the picture!! What was the most satisfying aspect of this order is the packaging it was shipped in . A++++ A box with air bubble bag to protect it . Inside this box and bubble wrap there is another box ... in the second box there is is the expresso watch box where the corners are protected by hard plastic corner things... awesome !! Great buy !! Shipped fast !! So happy thank youu!!! I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela T

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful solid storage unit to showcase your watches! Seller deivered merchandise in a quick manner. Merchandise was well protected ... Packaging was superb! This product is a showroom show piece! Was given as a birthday gift to a young man who has begun to appreciate watches after receiving a special one for a graduation gift. He absolutely loves it. Now I'm considering purchasing one for grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.L.O.M.A.

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: These watch boxes are beautiful and fantastic workmanship! If you tried to get these made on your own, you'd easily pay several hundred dollars. If you're thinking of buying one or two of these boxes......buy an extra one. That way you'll have no excuse not to go out an pick up that additional watch you've been looking at. I bought three and just ordered a forth. After all my $9.95 (and two cereal box tops) Cherrio's watch and my $14.00 Micky Mouse watch deserve a good home next to my Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Open Top Design
customer_reviews.text: Great for Solar Powered Watches and this is what I use mine for. The fit and finish are awesome, with no latches that distract your eyes from the watches, I have several solar powered watches and this offers an excellent display while allowing light to maintain the battery charge. Excellent fit and finish. A well made case for your watches.
customer_reviews.author: dmbTank

customer_reviews.title: This company will make sure you’re 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality watch box for under $40, I was pleasantly surprised. I needed a watch case with a clear opening on top because my watches charge by light/solar. I was using a watch case drawer. This case is elegant, displays my watches for everybody to see and allows charging on all my watches.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great box, but partitions are a little narrow for large face watches
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new watch box. Its well made and the glass is nice and clear and he can see all of his watches. The only problem is the space between the watches is a little narrow and one of his watches, with a large face, cannot fit nicely between the partitions.
customer_reviews.author: Winch06

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service and Custom Engraving
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case about 6 months ago and loved it so much the first time that I purchased one for a gift. I wanted a bit different engraving then what they are offering today on Amazon, so I sent their customer service an email of what I wanted engraved and they accommodated 100%. I recommend this product to anyone that is a watch collector and prefers to have beautiful display of their most commonly used watches.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stumpff

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my stepfather, an incredibly hard person to shop for. I was a little disappointed to know that he had already received a watch box but he ended up giving the other one to my mom and keeping this one for himself because it fits men watches much better than the other he had received. Its nicely constructed and is pretty as well as functional.
customer_reviews.author: HollyDolly

customer_reviews.title: The case is very nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: The case is very nice and clean. The only thing that bothers me is the little pillow cushions are not steady in the slots. Every time I move the case the slots are moved as well. I wish they would make the cushions tighter to the case. Please send me new cushions!
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wooden Watch Case
customer_reviews.text: This watch box was purchased as a gift for my son. The box is beautifully crafted from a dark wood (ebony) with a nice glass window on top. The inside is soft velour and will hold multiple watches. His birthday is a few months away so I don't have any feedback from him yet. It is high quality and I am sure it will be appreciated and used.
customer_reviews.author: Homewood Artist

customer_reviews.title: Watch Box Has Clean Lines
customer_reviews.text: This is the first watch box I have owned. My watches have just been lying around the bedroom. I like this box because of its clean lines. No hinges, locks, or other hardware. It opens and closes very easily, and the lid stays open until I close it. It is a very attractive way to display my watches.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kime

customer_reviews.title: Built with Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to purchase the price noted but I'm glad I did. The box is built with quality and study components. The lid lifts with ease and closes just as well. I have had for a few months now and love the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Losfirstduty

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out beautifully. I had them laser engrave it, and it turned out just as I hoped. Don't be afraid to put a name on it, not just the initials. I put a name on it that had 10 letters total, with a space in the middle, and it fit very well. I was shocked at how well it is built and the customization options, given the cheap price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Meggs

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Case
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful watch case! I loved everything about it and am quite confident that my husband will too for Christmas this year. I showed it to co-workers who couldn't believe that I didn't spend a fortune on the box. While it took longer than usual (I expected it to arrive in 3-4 days and it took a week) it's still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samara W.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE , YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPOINTED !
customer_reviews.text: This box is exactly what I wanted, Very good quality and very nice looking. It holds and displays all my quality watches.Great dust protection and keeps small hands off.It doesn't lock but why would it when someone could simply carry it off. I'm sure I will be buying another one soon. Thanks guys for a really great product that did not disappoint !
customer_reviews.author: Billy T. aka, Oob Ooberton

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Scratched
customer_reviews.text: This wood watch box arrived with a variety of small scratches and indintations on the wood that obviously were caused during the manufacturing process or when it was packaged up for delivery by the seller. Update: The seller sent me another watch box free of charge which I really appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful storage for watches
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jewelry box to store your watches. I was impressed by the quality of this box and the attention to details like a soft close hinge lid and what I think are magnets to hold the lid closed. The wood seems good quality and I appreciated that there is clear glass on top to see the different watches. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine_AW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to received this product wrapped in an aesthetically looking box with enough Styrofoam to ensure no damage during transit. The box appears to be made of a synthetic wood that feels more like metal. From looking it at you would swear it's wood but it feels more metallic. The watch cushions seem durable and each slot can hold most standard sized watches. The biggest watch I have is 41.5mm (the chronograph) and it fits quite well. You can spend hundreds of dollars on a watch box made out of wood but this item looks elegant enough to pass muster.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch box
customer_reviews.text: I've never spent a lot of money on watches. Finally spent the money on a nice Bulova so wanted a nice case to place it in. Classy looking case, love the "window", and holds my 6 watches even though only 1 of them is really worth more than $100. Would recommend, very nice looking case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonschwan

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what is more irritating. The fact ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is more irritating. The fact that's the box arrived and looked as though someone sat on it and kicked it around or the imperfections on the watch box itself. I have scratches and random markings on there.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Rating is personal and not indicative of product or seller’s quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it arrived with a chip in the wood in the corner. That aside, the watch holders are too large for my watches (made for larger wrists...most likely best for men or larger-wristed women) Otherwise, it seems made well and was as described. It just didn’t work for my purposes. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a well made box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wooden box appears to be well made and the lid fits nicely. I chose this one because it did not have as lock and I like the plane look. The little locks on many other boxes are a joke so I chose this one. I think that it is a good value. If there is a negative for me it would be that it is actually a little large and the watch's shuffle around when the box is picked up. That can be easily fixed with some extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schudda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. My husband loves it and loves the glass top which he needs to light charge the watches and so the numbers are illuminated. Magnetic closure helps. Great great bargain. Very nice gift. They plant a tree when you register online.
customer_reviews.author: Zeniphyr

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: After having my watches all jumbled together in a fairly small drawer this organizer is heavenly! After I "filled the pillows" there was room to stack some across the back on the dividers, too. They look so nice all in a row with all their bright colors and different faces......makes me smile to just look at them.
customer_reviews.author: MickyBN

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend for his birthday, and he absolutely loved it. It’s very timeless and simple, with 6 spaces for his growing watch collection. He’s big into expensive watches so it was nice to see his last name engraved on a piece that will hold through the years and protect his most prized wrist watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case and came well packaged. Mine didn't have on flaw on it.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicEndurance80

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship, looks great on my dresser. I have a better admiration for my watches.. and I'm not even a watch guy!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Day

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to do with all the watches I have and this watch box organizer was the perfect solution for me. I was easily able to put my watches in. I now have it on my dresser so I can pick and choose which watch I want to wear without having them in a pile.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Do not engrave!
customer_reviews.text: The box looks great but the engraving has much to be desired. I was very disappointed in the quality of it, it made the box look cheap. This was a gift and luckily the reciever loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Case was ok but the construction wasn't the greatest. See the picture attached for one of the corners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He thought the box / package was for me because it was packed so well and looked elegant. I've enclosed a picture. I will definitely be buying another one in 2020. Quality is great, looks very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: E Leale

customer_reviews.title: Great case for my mini watch collection!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Very solid build and elegantly designed. Con: I do wish it was more secure when closing the lid. If it's just sitting on a counter it's perfectly fine. But if I were to travel with it (and stuff it in a bag), I feel as though the watches may fall out. Overall, I wold highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a birthday present for my boyfriend. So happy I decided on this one! Amazing quality, especially for the price. He was blown away and even scolded me for spending too much. Extremely impressed, and will definitely be purchasing another one as he's beginning his watch collection!
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product as a gift. I was overwhelmed by the beauty and elegance of the watch box. The engraving on the clear glass lid added that little extra something. It looks far more expensive than it actually was. Will definitely shop with you again. Your attention to detail, and the quality of this product is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my husband's Father's Day gift. It is perfect. the craftsmanship is beautiful. It's very classy looking and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, it has a very professional and elegant ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it has a very professional and elegant look about it. The slots accommodate all of my watches even my samsung Gear S. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: Nice box!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice box. Well-made and sturdy. The etching was nice and done very quickly. I was afraid that having the initials added would delay shipping, but nope!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have many watched, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice watch box. It could be left out on your dresser. A little pillow lifts out so your watch safely sits in its compartment. Really like it. Just prrfect
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hindmarch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my son a unique gift. He has everything so I got his name personalized on the watch box. It was very nice, well made and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for collectors
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and it looks very classy when engraved. I didn’t give it 5 stars because it doesn’t fit with larger watches. Very simple but very well made.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, well made box
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, as described. Good and solid box, easy to use and very attractive to look at. My husband moved his watches right in and is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Weinman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely case for storing watches. I got one for myself and 1 for my husband. His watches are pretty big and they fit without squeezing. Beats having several watch cases all over the place. The colour is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made watch case....
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass, you’re able to see your watches. Very well made. My only complaint, (as others said) is that the lid doesn’t stay open .... but isn’t anything that would stop me from purchasing. In fact, I bought a second one to accommodate my growing watch collection!
customer_reviews.author: AML, Westbury, NY

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for the other reviews; safely shipped, well made, and great value! Gifted item.
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews before I purchased this item and I have to agree with a lot of what they said. Great craftsmanship, ships safely in sturdy packaging, strong hinge and overall quality buy! This was a gift for my SO who has started his watch collection. I’m grateful I was able to find this display case - he loves it. I chose it based off the reviews and the natural wood finish, it goes well with the scandi decor in my bedroom where it’s kept.
customer_reviews.author: bt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: The wooden box and the inside makes it a personable and nice gift for anyone that likes to keep their watches in a single and organized location. The only thing I don't like about this product is that the lid does not stay open when is in the full upright position and closes at the slight touch of the box and is really loud when it does close. You have to hold the lid, remove your watch from the inside and close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Elegantly crafted
customer_reviews.text: This watch box is elegantly crafted, especially due to the lack of closing hardware on the front. Indeed the finish of the box and the magnetic closure make this box a winner. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Seale

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product is well built and worth the money. Received it as a birthday gift and looks great, would definitely recommend to others! Also, had a minor issue with my purchase, great customer service, responded immediately and resolved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay P.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very sturdy construction, not flimsy. It is solid wood with a glass window, not plastic. I was sceptical once I read the reviews, but glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Yelrabe

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant & classy. Definitely worth more than the price. The perfect gift for a collector of nice watches. My husband was looking at a 300$ case. I purchased this and he thought I paid more. Of course I said no different. Lol
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubs. He loved it and uses it for his watches. It is very well constructed and looks beautiful. Appears more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for your money.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased. I should have gotten the box with more slots but he loves what he got. It would have been better if it was Personalized but it takes a long time before they can ship it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the woodtone for Christmas present, I was a little hesitant due to some previous reviews. The watch box was delivered in good condition and seems to be well made... The corners all matched up, no dents or scratches, a nice looking item!
customer_reviews.author: ZNJ17

customer_reviews.title: Gf love love these nice got a lot of nice watches ...
customer_reviews.text: Gf love love these nice got a lot of nice watches we'll hold big and small ones looks good the way I got them laid showing my watches going buy more I really wish I bough all pine boxes they look great and diff
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA FIELDS

customer_reviews.title: Fair Watch Box for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my son who may have inherited his dad's passion for timepieces. Not the best quality, but good enough to keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful way to display watches
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I purchased this because my husband didn't like hearing his watches tick at night! This box does the trick. It looks beautiful on our dresser, wonderfully displays my husband's watches, and it keeps the ticking noise from distracting us when trying to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: AGinsbe1

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Christmas present from me to me. I love it. I was so surprised when I opened it & saw how nice it is especially for the small investment that I made into it. I have put all my wooden watches in it and they look magnificent in it.
customer_reviews.author: RHorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Personalized Watch Case
customer_reviews.text: This personalized watch case is beautiful! It was a big hit with my son-in-law at Christmas. The initials could have been darker, as they didn’t show up at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Much better looking that I had expected for the price. Good quality. Yeah, as others mentioned, the cushions should be larger but it works fine. Some people say their hinges don't lock open but mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Osorio

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR, SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I just got the watch box organizer. So far, so good. I opened it before giving it to my man for Valentine's day. I wanted to make sure it wasn't broken or had any scratches and it's in perfect shape. It's exactly what he wanted for his watch collection. He loved it and it matches his bedroom decor perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: linda joseph

customer_reviews.title: quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely impressed - everything about it is perfection. The case is aligned perfectly, the finish is without a blemish, and even the glass was utterly clean of manufacturing bumps, smudges, or glue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This watch organzier exceeded my expectations. It is beautifully crafted and has a nice heft to it. There is nice attention to detail, like the lined underside, the way the box closes, and the beautiful glass window The box was well protected in shipment too. No dings or blemishes. It looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose watch pillows
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this watch box. The pillows in the box are too small and my watches rolled around. The box is nice looking and constructed well, but if you want a display case for watches and it can't keep them still, your collection will look like a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Light stain wood box is too light
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is decent but the color is way off. The box I received was almost like unfinished wood with essentially no stain. Definitely not like the picture. I returned it and ordered the darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great box!!
customer_reviews.text: This box looks amazing. You can tell it was well built. Unfortunately it's made in China but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this thing is beautiful for the price. The glass looks more like plastic than actual glass but after a good cleaning it’s clear. I also can’t get the top to stay open but I think that’s just from it being brand new and needing to wear it in. Overall a very nice finish and quality product!
customer_reviews.author: John Lipari

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Two sizes were purchased as Christmas gifts. Receivers were thrilled. The quality of the product is superior and meticulous care was taken in the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful gift for a watch lover!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL well made box, and I received it - personalized - in only three days. My husband loved it, and it holds his watches perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mel W.

product_meta.title: Solid Wood Watch Box Organizer with Glass Display Top by Case Elegance
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :13.83 x 2.53 x 3.67 inches; 2.53 Pounds
 * Item model number :CE-WOODEN-WATCH-LIGHT
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :February 2, 2016
 * Manufacturer :case Elegance
 * ASIN :B01AFRS1BM

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #55,939 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #23 inWatch Cabinets & Cases 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars2,174 ratings
feature_bullets: ✅ Elegant solid WOOD CONSTRUCTION and REAL GLASS viewing lid connect UP TO SIX of your horologic treasures to the relaxing spaces of your life
✅ Embedded MAGNETS assure the lid stays in place, lid stays open as you swap timepieces out for a new look.
✅ Each PROTECTIVE PILLOW fits most sizes and styles of watches, large and small, men's and women's.
✅ Inconspicuous FELT BOTTOM also prevents any furniture surface scratching once you find the perfect spot.
✅ COMPATIBLE with various wearables such as fitness trackers, GPS units, etc.
